Objects.ShortDescription: This zone controls visibility of certain objects arg[0] = value , set this value to the ViewId property of other objects to make them visible when the player is in this area
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Warps the player to another point in the stage. add a WarpCubeOutOnly object in the GenerateChildren property
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: This object follows a rail, add a rail in the level, then copy it inside this object. Args can control the speed ?
Objects.LongDescription:
This object follows a rail, add a rail in the level, then copy it inside this object. Args can control the speed ?
arg[7]: unknown, sometimes is 0
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: This is a thwomp, arg[0] = max y (relative to it's position), if not set or -1 is 500
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: This object follows a rail, add a rail in the level, then copy it inside this object. Args can control the speed ?
Objects.LongDescription:
This object follows a rail, add a rail in the level, then copy it inside this object. Args can control the speed ?
arg[7]: unknown, sometimes is 0
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: arg[0] = how many bars, if not set is 1 arg[1] = speed, if >0 it goes counterclockwise
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: arg[0] = how many bars, if not set is 1 arg[1] = speed, if >0 it goes counterclockwise
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Add in the GenerateChildren property a HammerBrosMovePoint for each point it will jump
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: A lava fireball arg[0] = max y (relative to it's position)
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Elevator found in bowser's castle of world 1 arg[0] = max y (relative to it's position)
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: arg[2] = max y (relative to it's position)
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: arg[2] = max y (relative to it's position)
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: A rotating gear. arg[1] = speed, if > 0 it goes counterclockwise
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: A rotating gear. arg[1] = speed, if > 0 it goes counterclockwise
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: a Cheep Cheep. Add a rail to the stage and copy it inside this object
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: A green pipe Add a DokanOutOnly object in the place where mario should spawn.
Objects.LongDescription: A green pipe Add a DokanOutOnly object in the place where mario should spawn. Args can control if camera moves to the DokanOutOnly or just appears there ?
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Can be only one copy of this object in the stage. arg[0] = if 0 the smb level completed theme plays
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Spawns enemies, arg[0] how many enemies can be on stage, arg[1] enemy type
Objects.LongDescription:
Spawns enemies: arg[0] how many enemies can be on stage arg[1] enemy type
arg[1]: 1: Drybone, other values Goomba
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Rotating bar(s) of NeedleBlocks, arg[0] how many blocks per bar, arg[1] how many bars, arg[2] rotating speed
Objects.LongDescription: Rotating bar(s) of NeedleBlocks arg[0] how many blocks per bar since every block is 100 units arg[0] * 100 is the length of the bar arg[1] how many bars arg[2] rotating speed
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Purple warp box, has a timer that warps the player back, the player is spawned from the children WarpPorter.
Objects.LongDescription: Purple warp box, a timer that warps the player back, the default timer is 10 seconds. Add another WarpPorter as a children, that will spawn the player
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Spawns a coin
Objects.Author: exelix11

Objects.ShortDescription: Piranha Plant for Pipe. If defeated, it will activate SwitchDeadOn.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Spawns a "loose" 1-Up Mushroom. Has an animation and effect when spawned via SwitchAppear.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Activates SwitchA when it finishes its cutscene. Appears with cutscene when SwitchAppear is activated.
Objects.LongDescription: Activates SwitchA when it finishes its cutscene. This is used to cancel the effect of the PlayerControlOffArea. Appears with cutscene when SwitchAppear is activated. If SwitchAppear is set to -1, it appears on level load.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: If the Mario enters this area, they cannot be controlled until the flag associated with the area's SwitchKill is turned on.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: The dimensions of this object are 200x100x200
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Spawns Rainbow Notes along the specified path when SwitchA is turned on
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Used to make coins appear with an effect when a flag is turned on. Give it child "Coin"/s with their "SwitchAppear"s all set to the flag that will be turned on. Args[1] = CoinGathering Time
Objects.LongDescription: Used to make coins appear with an effect when a flag is turned on. Give it child "Coin"/s with their "SwitchAppear"s all set to the flag that will be turned on. Args[1] = The amount of time the coin appears for after being activated in a CoinGathering setup. -1 is permanently.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Switches on the flag specified in SwitchA when all child Candlestand objects are lit
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Spawns a powerup (at the location of the last defeated enemy) when the specified number of the child enemies(Arg[0]) are defeated. The powerup spawned depends on the enemy.
Objects.LongDescription:
Spawns a powerup (at the location of the last defeated enemy) when the specified number of the child enemies are defeated. The powerup spawned depends on the enemy. Possibilities: Fire Piranha Plant - Fire Flower Big Tail Goomba, Tail Boo - Super Leaf Boomerang Bro. - Boomerang Flower
Args[0] = Number to defeat
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Friendly name: Goomba To make it spawn a Star Medal when defeated, give it a CoinCollect (aka Star Medal) child
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Red Ring To give makes this spawn Red Coins, give it five CoinRed children
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: To give this a destination, give it a child BlockNoteSuperWide with argument 1 set to 1.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Toad If you set a path, it will walk/run along it. args can set color, animation and item
Objects.LongDescription:
Toad If you set a path, it will walk/run along it.
args[0] = color: ≤1 - Red 2 - Blue 3 - Yellow 4 - Green ≥5 - Purple
args[1] = Animation: ≤0, ≥3 - Standing 1 - Jumping 2 - Scared 3 - Green
args[7] = item: ≤0 - None 1 - 1-Up Mushroom >2 - None, but stills plays throwing animation when approached
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: P Switch When pressed it permanently switches on the switch specified in SwitchA.
Objects.Author: Hiccup

Objects.ShortDescription: Friendly name: Bubbly Tree args[0]=Item when climbed args[2]=Item when bumped
Objects.LongDescription:
Friendly name: Bubbly Tree args[0]=Item when climbed: <1, >6 - Nothing 1 - 1-Up Mushroom 2 - Fire Flower (status dependant) 3 - Super Leaf (status dependant) 4 - Super Star 5 - Poison Mushroom 6 - Boomerang Flower (status dependant)
args[2]=Item when bumped (Appears when Mario rolls into the tree's stump): -1 - Nothing 0 - ? 1 - 5 Coins 2+ - ?
Objects.Author: Hiccup
